item.name: User

request.description: Grant a permission to a user. After this call has returned, the user will be allowed to execute the given intent.

item.description: Revoke a permission from a user. After this call has returned, the user will no longer be able to execute the given intent.

request.description: See the permissions for a given user.

header.warning: This is a duplicate header and will be overridden by the Authorization header generated by Postman.

request.description: Counts the number of notifications for the authenticated user. Returns the total as well as the number of unread notifications.

name: RunnerScripts

item.name: CreateSubproject
item.description: Automatically create a subproject, environment variables will be set accordingly.

item.name: CreateWorkflowitem
item.description: Automatically create Workflowitem, environment variables will be set accordingly.

item.name: CreateNotification
item.description: Automatically create a Notification for a new user.

description: Automatically create a new subproject, workflow item or notification using postmans Runner.
